description: I was unable to get iCloud sync to work, and I can confirm that the browser extension doesn't work as intended. Had to transfer my backup over WiFi. That being said, the inconvenience of having to manually update this vault is better than the alternative.

I use Enpass for over 6 years now, on Apple devices (MacBook and iPhone) as well as an Android device. Haven't had issues. However, this version (flatpak) can't even be activated, and neither synced. Every time I open the app I get asked to activate it. I will try to download directly from their website.
Great program to access my passwords from a backup, but cloud sync via iCloud doesn't work and neither does the browser extension. Here's hoping the next version enables these features.

Enpass works great as a Flatpak. The only issue I have with it is that the Firefox extension cannot see it and so there is no automatic form fill. I am convinced this is an Enpass issues and not a Firefox issue.

I am running Fedora Silverblue 38 using only Flatpaks for GUI apps.
Worked with Nextcloud sync! Happy to have it on Steamdeck!
summary: Happy to have it on SD

description: Would be 5 stars if on a desktop. It does not work well with Cloud, will try webdav or nextcloud as an option.
Doesn't work with any cloud on Steam Deck. Gets stuck on cloud auth.

Best to install using the cli and the how to from the official website. 
The Plasma Discover/Flatpak version is very buggy for some reason. It does not connect to the browser plugins.
Get's stuck on synchronizing data from iCloud. Apparently this is the case with all cloud based password safes in enpass.
The tray icon is blurry (seems to only be a problem with KDE Plasma) and icloud Sync is not working. I wished the devs would improve the experience on linux.
summary: Enpass is Great, the flatpak version isn't

description:
I like Enpass and have been using it for years. But this wrapper prevents it from syncing with the cloud. That's not great when you need your passwords on multiple devices.

If you have to sync it manually then you're better off just using Enpass Portable.
Unable to connect to cloud services for vaults, normal version such as deb works fine
